body: This is made me start learning japanese
Cover Mallow just heard the news about Sword/Shield.

Well in this story he was going out with Lily and ended up sleeping with Mallow. If it was just that then it'd only be cheating and not NTR, but near the end he ended up falling in love with Mallow and decided to stay with her, effectively dumping Lily for her, hence why it's NTR
